t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect your brand in Italy
s: Start your brand's Amazon journey by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry for free. After enrolling, you'll be able to unlock a suite of brand-building tools and obtain various protection benefits. You can enrol your brand even if you don't sell in an Amazon store.

t: VFAUOSIT Brand Kitchen Faucets Recalled Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children; Sold on Amazon.com by Whisper08 | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using these faucets and contact Whisper08 about disposal and a refund. Consumers will need to provide a photograph of disposal and their order number to receive the refund. Whisper08 is contacting all known purchasers directly.Until these faucets can be replaced, ...

t: CPSC Warns Consumers to Immediately Stop Using CEINOL Brand Bathroom Faucets Sold on Amazon.com Due to Dangerous Lead Exposure for Young Children | CPSC.gov
s: WASHINGTON, D.C. – The U.S. Consumer Product Safety Commission (CPSC) is warning consumers to immediately stop using CEINOL brand bathroom faucets sold on Amazon.com. The faucets were tested and found to contain lead that can leach into water at levels that can be particularly harmful to ...

t: Amazon Stores per Seller e Vendor: Valorizza il Tuo Brand su Amazon|Amazon Stores per Seller e Vendor: Valorizza il Tuo Brand su Amazon
s: March 21, 2023 - Per aggirare la rigidità tipica dei marketplace, Amazon ha creato gli Amazon Stores, un servizio self service che permette ai venditori con un marchio registrato di progettare e creare uno store multipagina per poter valorizzare i propri brand, prodotti e value proposition anche su Amazon.|Per ...
